Articles.Content:
I am having an odd issue with my weapons; many of them aren't working properly after I got your new update along with the newest version of BD. Most of my missiles are exploding after they get 6 to 7 km away from the aircraft, and NONE of the cruise missiles are working (the BD missiles input too much pitch and just slide into the ground, and P.E.W missiles are controlling COMPLETELY erratically.)

Any suggestions on how to fix this would be wonderful, and I can give more details upon request.

I found an issue with the Kh-39, as in it's not a missile at all. The second it's engine ignites, the missiles ZOOMS backwards and slams into the ground at this vertical angle.

Only problem I've found so far, other than symmetry flips the missiles around.

i have not noticed this behavior in my testing what version of PEW are you using and what version of BDArmory

- - - Updated - - -

I am having an odd issue with my weapons; many of them aren't working properly after I got your new update along with the newest version of BD. Most of my missiles are exploding after they get 6 to 7 km away from the aircraft, and NONE of the cruise missiles are working (the BD missiles input too much pitch and just slide into the ground, and P.E.W missiles are controlling COMPLETELY erratically.)

Any suggestions on how to fix this would be wonderful, and I can give more details upon request.

the missiles will automatically detonate after a set distance without acquiring their target with the exception of cruise missiles. the aero needs tweaking i am aware however in my experience it works for the moment. are you using FAR or NEAR?

- - - Updated - - -

I haven't tested to see if it's PEW or just the multiple mods I have making problems, but the R-37's attach node seems to be 45 degrees off from vertical, making for some odd attachments, namely floaty missiles.

I have noticed that as well but the unity and ksp setups are lined up correctly. thus i have no idea why this happens and would recommend rotating them slightly so they are aligned properly

I'm currently using 0.9.9 of BD Armory, and the most current version of your mod. The missiles exploding thing is solved now, thanks for that, by the way, but my cruise missiles are still completely defunct.

I'm currently using 0.9.9 of BD Armory, and the most current version of your mod. The missiles exploding thing is solved now, thanks for that, by the way, but my cruise missiles are still completely defunct.

i will take a look at them between classes today

Some more instructions in the part description would be nice since there are all the targeting systhems...

Update: Thx for doing that =)

Targeting ships is tricky... guess laser guidance will be a stop over for a few weapons. Also be ready for ALOT of air defenses. This list is nice to have. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_United_States_Navy_weapons

Today I am recording a start to finish video of me making an RGM-84 harpoon complete with full modeling texturing animating and unity rigging as well as cfg edits to assist everyone in making their own BDarmory addons. All I ask is that no one copy's or steals my own weapons

could you have a go at making some weapons like the ones off the MiG-21bis...i have had a go at making one and the only thing that is missing is the nuke..gun pod....and the missiles. i messages harpwner about it and he said he would try the nuke and gun pod. would you be willing to make a couple of missiles

as for the gunpod just use 2 .50cals right beside each other...

ohhhhhh, i see, thats a great idea for a gun pod and sorry i just googled MiG-21bis armament and i couldnt find any of them in the mod pack....probably me just being a massive noob

Ahhh cool, thanks for the info, I look forward to it

Hey guys im going to try and refocus and get R-10-out ASAP I've been spending alot of time recording the development which slows things and working on some top secret awesomeness for the BDArmoryFPS mod. R-10 will include new weapons and yet more retextures

Update: there is no parts update yet. I will be putting out part 3 and possibly 4 of the video series today and will pull myself away from an epic weapon for BDAFPS (I'm so happy with it!). And finally do the last missile for R-10 and finish the unity stuff.

R-10 will be a missile update but also add one new utility part. I am becoming more and more confident in my 3D modeling skills and intend to move into turrets and vehicle weapons in R-11 if I get into plugin making I intend to try some functional Explosive reactive armor. As for what kind of turrets I will making I am thinking something like the turret for a Russian T-90 and some lighter guns such as the turret of an M-2 Bradley or Russian BMP. I also want to make some aircraft cannons such as a Gsh-30. Perhaps some heavy artillery? R-11 however will be released only after a good break since I am currently involved heavily in BDAFPS as the primary modeler and texturer for them.

Edited September 9, 2015 by LORDPrometheus
